description:
This training course, which teaches the students how to create a stunning business presentation from scratch, is intend for any type of business professionals, who are passionate about PowerPoint but still donâ€™t have all the required skills to design their drafts in a professional looking slide decks. After completing this course not only the presentations you design will turn into professional, but it will be also you, who will turn into PowerPoint expert.

During the course I will lead you through the design of each presentation element. First we will start with the design of a modern template based on the color scheme of your logo. After that we will visualize our bullet points in more appealing style than just a text list. We also will design a process and a company goals. In a different section I will show you how to create an infographic map and in the end we will create a timeline with project milestones.

As result of the above, you will be able to design a premium final product, which emphasize the key presentation messages in a remarkable way and helps you impress your target audience.
title: How to design professional PowerPoint business presentation
